column2: "Bosoom a otsia ebiasa a Israelmba sii mu fii Egypt asaase do no
column3: da no ara na wɔbaa Sinai sar do."

column2: "Na aber a wotui fii Refidim
column3: na wɔbaa Sinai sar do no
column4: wɔkyeer nsera wɔ sar no do; na hɔ na Israel kyeer nsera wɔ bepɔw no enyim."

column2: "Na Moses fowee kɔr Nyankopɔn nkyɛn
column3: na EWURADZE fii bepɔw no do frɛɛ no see dɛ

column2: "Hom ehu dza medze mayɛ Egyptfo
column3: na mbrɛ mosoaa hom nkɔr ntsaban do
column4: na medze hom baa mara me nkyɛn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: sɛ hom betsie me ndze ara ampa
column6: hom bɛyɛ egyapadze a ɔsom bo efi aman nyinara mu ama me: osiandɛ asaase nyinara yɛ medze:"

column2: "na hom bɛyɛ asɔfo ahendzi
column3: nye ɔman krɔnkrɔn ama me. Iyinom nye nsɛm a fa ka kyerɛ Israelmba no."

column2: "Na Moses bae na ɔbɛfrɛɛ ɔman mpanyimfo no
column3: na ɔdze nsɛm yi a EWURADZE dze hyɛɛ no nyinara too hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara bɔɔ mu buae
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column5: yɛbɛyɛ. Na Moses kɛkaa ɔman no hɔn nsɛm no kyerɛɛ EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mereba wo nkyɛn wɔ mununkum kebii mu
column5: ama sɛ menye wo kasa a ɔman no aatse
column6: na eso wɔaagye wo edzi daa. Na Moses kaa ɔman no hɔn nsɛm no kyerɛɛ EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Kɔ ɔman no nkyɛn
column4: na tsew hɔn ho ndɛ nye ɔkyena
column7: "na wonsiesie hɔnho nsie da a otsia ebiasa no: na da a otsia ebiasa no EWURADZE besian wɔ ɔman no nyinara enyim aba bepɔw Sinai do."

column2: "Na bɔ ɔman no ho ɔheban hyia
column3: se dɛ
column6: anaa hom annkɛka ne he: obiara a ɔbɛka bepɔw no oku na woboku no:"

column2: "nsa biara nnka no
column3: mbom abo na wonsiw no
column4: anaa tow na wɔntow no ma onhwira mu; sɛ abowa o
column6: orinnya nkwa: sɛ abɛn no hɛn kyɛr a

column2: "Na Moses sianee fi bepɔw no do kɔr ɔman no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔtseew ɔman no ho; na wɔhohoor hɔn ntar."

column2: "Na ɔsee ɔman no dɛ
column3: Hom nsiesie homho nsie da a otsia ebiasa no: mma wɔnnkɔ ɔbaa biara ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia ebiasa no
column3: anapa no
column5: nye mununkum kebii baa bepɔw no do
column6: na abɛn ndze dzendzen mbordo; na ɔman a wɔwɔ nseraban no mu nyinara ho popoe."

column2: "Na Moses dze ɔman no fir edzi fii nseraban no mu dɛ worikehyia Nyankopɔn; na wokegyinagyinaa bepɔw no ase afamu."
"Na bepɔw Sinai no nyinara rupun wusiw
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE nam gya mu sianee baa do: na no wusiw no tui kɔr sor dɛ fononoo mu wusiw
column4: na bepɔw no nyinara wosoow kɛsenara."

column2: "Na abɛn no ne ndze yɛɛ dzendzenndzen dodow no
column3: Moses kasae
column4: na Nyankopɔn dze ndze gyee no do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE sianee baa bepɔw Sinai do
column3: wɔ bepɔw no etsifi: na EWURADZE frɛɛ Moses dɛ ɔnkɔ bepɔw no etsifi: na Moses fowee kɔree."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Sian famu behyia ɔman no
column4: amma wɔaanntsetsew mu ammba EWURADZE nkyɛn ammbɔhwɛ

column2: "Na ma asɔfo no so a wɔba EWURADZE nkyɛn no ntsew hɔnho
column3: amma EWURADZE eenntu annhyɛ hɔn do."

column2: "Na Moses see EWURADZE dɛ
column3: Ɔman no runntum mmfow mmba bepɔw Sinai do: osiandɛ woara hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ
column4: Bɔ bepɔw no ho ɔheban hyia

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Kɔ
column6: nye Aaron ka wo ho: na mma asɔfo no nye ɔman no nntsetsew mu mmfow mmba EWURADZE nkyɛn

column2: "Nna Moses sianee kɔr ɔman no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ hɔn."
